mapper.insert: insert into Status(userNo, status, ModDt) values (${statusDto.userNo}, #{statusDto.status}, #{statusDto.modDt});
mapper.update: update Status set status = #{status}, modDt = #{modDt} where statusNo = ${statusNo};
mapper.select: select b.status from Status as b join User as a on a.statusNo = b.statusNo where a.userNo=${userNo} ;
select b.status, a.phone from (select statusNo, phone from Access as a join User as b on a.userNo = b.userNo where accessUserNo = ${userNo}) as a join Status as b on a.statusNo = b.statusNo;
